trans-unit.source: Provides a customizable activity designer surface for users to visually modify on a workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> allows users to modify how an activity appears on a workflow design surface.

When you associate <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> with a custom activity class using the `Designer` attribute, the custom activity's appearance is different from other activities when a user drops the custom activity onto a design surface.

Once <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> displays an activity on the design surface, users can draw connectors to other activity designers and resize the designer within the parameters defined by the design surface.
Users can only add connectors to the custom activity because the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is associated with the top-level activity in a workflow.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
If no `AccessibleObject` is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
To get or set the `AccessibilityObject` property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the control.
Adds a connector to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AddConnector%2A> is called when a user adds a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
source or target contains a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The property for source or target contains a `null` reference (`Nothing`).
The current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is not the container for the connector to add.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically when a user resizes the designer's child designers.
When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is resized automatically; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Gets or sets the margin size to render around the child designers when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> is automatically resized.
The default size of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> is a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> object with dimensions of 40 pixels by 40 pixels.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property associated with the current workflow theme is set to `true`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A> settings are half the height and half the width of the grid size.

When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMargin%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the margin to render around the child designers of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

The default behavior of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> allows the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to grow as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A> property.
When you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A>, the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is updated.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The default setting is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly"></xref>.

Brings the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the top of the z-order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as its top visible child designer.
You can use this method to display a designer at the top of the z-order when a user selects it.

`containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A>.
If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.BringToFront%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to bring to the top of the z-order.
containedDesigner contains a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
containedDesigner is not found in the collection.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can create a connection between the specified connection point on a source child activity designer and the specified connection point on a target child activity designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the source activity designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> to check on the target activity designer.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can draw a connector between source and target activity designers; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed on a workflow design surface.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> always returns `false`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be collapsed; otherwise `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether a user can visually resize the specified child activity designer in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.CanResizeContainedDesigner%2A> returns `true` if `containedDesigner` is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
Other types of designers cannot be resized.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
`true` if a user can visually resize the specified activity designer; otherwise, `false`.
Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorAdded%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded> event.

Occurs when a user changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> locations associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorChanged%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged> event.
Occurs when a user removes a connector from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> is the registered delegate event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved> event.
Gets a read-only collection of connectors that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.

A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Creates a connector between the two specified connection points.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that was created.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
`true` if the designer is being disposed; `false` if the designer is being finalized.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface.
`true` if users can drag and draw connectors on the free-form activity designer surface; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized on the workflow design surface.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `false`.
In all other conditions <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.EnableVisualResizing%2A> returns `true`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> can be visually resized; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the first child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection, or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection count is zero.
The first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The current <xref href="System.Object"></xref> in the navigation order.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> returns a glyph for each connectable child designer found on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Returns information about the `FreeformActivityDesigner` at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> checks whether the location has occurred on a connector or one of the child activity designers.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> occurs on a child activity that is being dragged to another location, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> returns information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, not the designer being moved.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
`Initialize` adds a designer property extender to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> for it to use until the design surface is destroyed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

Adds the specified read-only collection of activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> does not contain any child designers.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Gets or sets the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.

When <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Location%2A> is set due to a user resizing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, the designer maintains the relative positions of its child designers.
A `Point` that represents the location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> in logical coordinates.
Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Moves activities to a specified location within the design surface.
Location to move activities to.
Collection that contains the activities to move to moveLocation.
Moves the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the specified location.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the moved designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.

`containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A>.
If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MoveContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to move.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the designer's new location.
containedDesigner contains a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorAdded"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorChanged"></xref> event.
A connector is changed when a user changes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> locations at either end of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> object.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ConnectorRemoved"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a child activity is added or deleted from its `Activities` collection.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the added or removed activities.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a connection has been established between two of its contained activity designers.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnContainedDesignersConnected%2A> is called when a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> is drawn between the source on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> object's contained activity designers to target on a second contained activity designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to begin drawing the connector.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> location to finish drawing the connector.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed within the bounds of its design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
Occurs when a key is pressed when the designer has the keyboard focus.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns the size of the current bounding rectangle for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> when <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> calculates and returns new size settings for the bounding rectangle.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to true and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.MinimumSize%2A>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> when a user is visually resizing it at design time.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs all resizing tasks on the workflow design surface.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSizeMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnResizing%2A> performs layout tasks, but no resizing tasks.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.AutoSize%2A> is set to `false`, all contained designers retain their previous locations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.

Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> always sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Text%2A> property to an empty string and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ShowGrid%2A> is set to `true`, the locations of each child designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> is snapped to the nearest grid line.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.RemoveConnector%2A> deletes the specified connector from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.Connectors%2A> collection and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.OnConnectorRemoved%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to remove.
connector contains a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Resizes the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the dimensions of specified size.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> sets new bounds for the resized designer and performs all required layout operations for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> on the workflow design surface.

`containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A>.
If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ResizeContainedDesigner%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to resize.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new dimensions of the designer.
containedDesigner contains a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
Sets the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to the bottom of the z-order of the `FreeformActivityDesigner`.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> modifies the z-order for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> to display the specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> as the bottom visible designer on the design surface.
You can use this method to display a designer at the bottom of the z-order when a user deselects it.

`containedDesigner` must be in a child of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A>.
If it is not, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.SendToBack%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to set to the back of the z-order.
containedDesigner contains a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
containedDesigner is not found in the collection.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface.

Unless overridden in a class that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner.ShowConnectorsInForeground%2A> always returns `false`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> draws connectors in the foreground of its design surface; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
